TestDescription.name: Proxy can be used to connect to arbitrary ports
TestDescription.Description:
The remote proxy server can be used to connect to arbitrary ports. [break]
The proxy allows everyone to perform HTTP requests to arbitrary ports, such as: [pre] GET http://www.acunetix.com:25 [/pre]
This may allow attackers to bypass your firewall and connect to sensitive ports like 23 (telnet), 25 (sendmail) using the proxy.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Restrict proxy access to valid users and/or hosts. Deny access to non-authorized ports.

Reference.database: Setting up a Secure Proxy Server using Various Technologies
